text: Podaná () is a Greek argot based on rearranging syllables, similar to Verlan and Vesre. Podaná itself is a reversal of anápoda (ανάποδα), meaning "upside- down." Examples include: tsosbá (inverted bátsos, slang for "cop"), zakipré (inverted prezáki, slang for "junkie"), dafoú (inverted foúnda, "hashish"), fosbá (inverted báfos, "joint"). ==References== Category:Cant languages Category:Greek slang Category:Language games
title: Podaná
